titles.title: A resolution designating May 5 through 9, 2008, as National Substitute Teacher Recognition Week.
A resolution designating May 5 through 9, 2008, as National Substitute Teacher Recognition Week.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of measure as passed Senate

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates May 5-May 9, 2008, as the 7th annual National Substitute Teacher Recognition Week.
Recognizes the vital role substitute teachers play in a child's education.
